author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Northern Ireland gets support from Hotel Federation to boost tourism - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Northern Ireland gets support from Hotel Federation to boost tourism Published on : Monday, August 17, 2015
The Northern Ireland is being focused on by the Hotelâ€™s Federation which is planning a proper tourism strategy to boost the growth of this sector. The strategy will be placed by early next year.
It is important to bring up Northern Ireland and therefore a partnership is essential for the tourism prospects of the region.
The hotels have been spending up to a billion pound in the last decade and the budget is set to spend more. The market looks to be promising and this sector has chances of generating more feels Janice Gault from the Hotels Federation.
A better planning is required. There is great potential in this sector and a more worked out plan could help the sector achieve its target.
